title: Organizational Learning and Transformational Leadership: The Role of Knowledge Sharing and Trust

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational organizational management theories, understanding of leadership concepts, and basic statistical knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners are public institution professionals in science fields, highly interested in enhancing organizational effectiveness. They can use smartphones but lack PC environments.

learning_goals: Explain the impact of transformational leadership on organizational learning, knowledge-sharing culture, and interpersonal trust using structural equation modeling
Analyze pathways through which knowledge-sharing attitudes and trust levels influence organizational learning outcomes
Propose leadership strategy improvements for public organizations based on research findings

resources: Whiteboard, Markers, Printed Materials, Smartphone App (Android/iOS)
Structural Equation Modeling Case Analysis Worksheet
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
